attributes.action: Reduce the tax which is payable on gasoline .This percentage is the highest in the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would ask the Goverment to listen and take note of what the majority of the United Kingdom is requesting.
Serious consideration to be given to a reduction in the amount of tax which the whole country has to pay when purchasing gasoline from gas stations .Any future increases in the cost will seriously affect the standard of living within the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=fuel+duty&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=audit+bank&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
